query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.OPERATEUSERID in (@userByDeptid@) and est.OPERATEUSERID is not null and est.complainttype1 in (@complainttype1@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@) and est.complainttype2 in (@complainttype2@) and est.complainttype in (@complainttype@) and est.complainttype4 in (@complainttype4@) and est.complainttype5 in (@complainttype5@) and est.complainttype6 in (@complainttype6@) and est.complainttype7 in (@complainttype7@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.sheetid,est.mainid,est.title,est.complainttype1,est.todeptid,est.senduserid from est_complaint est where est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s9@' and est.complainttype2='@s3@' and est.complainttype='@s4@' and est.complainttype4='@s5@' and est.complainttype5='@s6@' and est.complainttype6='@s7@' and est.complainttype7='@s8@'

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.completeflag=2 and est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.OPERATEUSERID in (@userByDeptid@) and est.OPERATEUSERID is not null and est.complainttype1 in (@complainttype1@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@) and est.complainttype2 in (@complainttype2@) and est.complainttype in (@complainttype@) and est.complainttype4 in (@complainttype4@) and est.complainttype5 in (@complainttype5@) and est.complainttype6 in (@complainttype6@) and est.complainttype7 in (@complainttype7@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.sheetid,est.mainid,est.title,est.complainttype1,est.todeptid,est.senduserid from est_complaint est where est.status=1 and (est.maindelayflag=0 or est.maindelayflag is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.completeflag=2 and est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s9@' and est.complainttype2='@s3@' and est.complainttype='@s4@' and est.complainttype4='@s5@' and est.complainttype5='@s6@' and est.complainttype6='@s7@' and est.complainttype7='@s8@'

select distinct est.sheetid,est.mainid,est.title,est.complainttype1,est.todeptid,est.senduserid from est_complaint est where est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s9@' and est.complainttype2='@s3@' and est.complainttype='@s4@' and est.complainttype4='@s5@' and est.complainttype5='@s6@' and est.complainttype6='@s7@' and est.complainttype7='@s8@' and est.mainid not in( select distinct est1.mainid from est_complaint est1 where est1.status=1 and (est1.maindelayflag=0 or est1.maindelayflag is null) and (est1.operatetype=46 or est1.operatetype=11) and est1.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est1.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est1.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est1.complainttype1='@s2@' and est1.TODEPTID='@s9@' and est.complainttype2='@s3@' and est.complainttype='@s4@' and est1.completeflag=2 and est.complainttype4='@s5@' and est.complainttype5='@s6@' and est.complainttype6='@s7@' and est.complainttype7='@s8@')

query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.OPERATEROLEID in (@subroleFromDeptid@) and est.OPERATEROLEID is not null and est.complainttype1 in (@complainttype1@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@) and est.complainttype2 in (@complainttype2@) and est.complainttype in (@complainttype@) and est.complainttype4 in (@complainttype4@) and est.complainttype5 in (@complainttype5@) and est.complainttype6 in (@complainttype6@) and est.complainttype7 in (@complainttype7@) and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.sheetid,est.mainid,est.title,est.complainttype1,est.todeptid,est.senduserid from est_complaint est where est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.OPERATEROLEID='@s1@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s9@' and est.complainttype2='@s3@' and est.complainttype='@s4@' and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32 and est.complainttype4='@s5@' and est.complainttype5='@s6@' and est.complainttype6='@s7@' and est.complainttype7='@s8@'

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.completeflag=2 and est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.OPERATEROLEID in (@subroleFromDeptid@) and est.OPERATEROLEID is not null and est.complainttype1 in (@complainttype1@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@) and est.complainttype2 in (@complainttype2@) and est.complainttype in (@complainttype@) and est.complainttype4 in (@complainttype4@) and est.complainttype5 in (@complainttype5@) and est.complainttype6 in (@complainttype6@) and est.complainttype7 in (@complainttype7@) and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.sheetid,est.mainid,est.title,est.complainttype1,est.todeptid,est.senduserid from est_complaint est where est.status=1 and (est.maindelayflag=0 or est.maindelayflag is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.completeflag=2 and est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.OPERATEROLEID='@s1@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s9@' and est.complainttype2='@s3@' and est.complainttype='@s4@' and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32 and est.complainttype4='@s5@' and est.complainttype5='@s6@' and est.complainttype6='@s7@' and est.complainttype7='@s8@'

select distinct est.sheetid,est.mainid,est.title,est.complainttype1,est.todeptid,est.senduserid from est_complaint est where est.status=1 and (est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE=0 or est.MAINIFDEFERRESOLVE is null) and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.OPERATEROLEID='@s1@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s9@' and est.complainttype2='@s3@' and est.complainttype='@s4@' and est.complainttype4='@s5@' and est.complainttype5='@s6@' and est.complainttype6='@s7@' and est.complainttype7='@s8@' and est.mainid not in( select distinct est1.mainid from est_complaint est1 where est1.status=1 and (est1.maindelayflag=0 or est1.maindelayflag is null) and (est1.operatetype=46 or est1.operatetype=11) and est1.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est1.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est1.OPERATEROLEID='@s1@' and est1.complainttype1='@s2@' and est1.TODEPTID='@s9@' and est1.completeflag=2 and est.complainttype2='@s3@' and est.complainttype='@s4@' and LENGTH(est1.operateroleid)=32 and est.complainttype4='@s5@' and est.complainttype5='@s6@' and est.complainttype6='@s7@' and est.complainttype7='@s8@') and LENGTH(est.operateroleid)=32
